About.description: I am a dedicated developer who enjoys taking on challenges and expanding skills across diverse projects. My curiosity helps me adapt quickly to new trends and optimize my work. I strive to build performant, scalable solutions tailored to users.

bullets: Deepening advanced software architectures and distributed systems.
Academic projects focused on performance and scalable application design.

items.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
bullets: Earned a Bachelor's in Computer Science in the "Software Engineering and Databases" track.
Built strong foundations in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering.

bullets: Built a leave management platform covering requests, approvals, and tracking with Next.js, NestJS, and MySQL.
Modeled a relational database (employees, requests, approvals,...).
Implemented REST APIs with RBAC- and JWT-based authentication.

items.title: Web Developer Intern

bullets: Designed and developed a visitor check-in/out tracking web app with HTML, CSS, and JSP.
Delivered an admin dashboard to visualize and manage visitor flows, reducing entry errors.

Contact.sectionDesc: Have a project in mind or just want to talk? Send me a message and let's see how we can work together.

flotmax.summary: Educational platform to solve, simulate, and visualize maximum flow problems with a simple and fast interface.
flotmax.challenge: We were asked to program the process and calculation steps to solve a maximum flow problem in order to facilitate verification on paper.
challengePoints: Implement of the Ford-Fulkerson and MANUEL BLOCH algorithms.
flotmax.solution: An interactive interface was created to draw graphs, run calculations, and display the steps of each iteration until the maximum flow is obtained.
flotmax.solutionHighlight: The solution accelerated algorithm comprehension and reduced resolution time for complex exercises.

features.title: Step-by-step simulation
features.desc: Detailed iteration display to follow each capacity update.

features.title: Graph editing
features.desc: Quick addition/removal of nodes and edges with constraint controls.

features.title: Automatic verification
features.desc: Built-in checks to validate results against expected outcomes.

moodspace.summary: Mood tracking application featuring temporal visualizations to help users better understand their emotional cycles.
moodspace.challenge: Users lacked simple tools to record their mood and focus their attention.
challengePoints: Create clear charts to visualize trends.
Develop an engaging experience to encourage consistent use.
moodspace.solution: Created an ultra-simple input journey, weekly charts, and other user-friendly sections.
moodspace.solutionHighlight: The app enables users to better understand their emotions and adopt consistent tracking habits.

features.title: AI Assistant
features.desc: The ultimate companion to guide users in expressing their emotions.

features.title: Evolutionary Curves
features.desc: Clear visualization of trends over 7, 30, and 90 days.

features.title: Personalized Moodboard
features.desc: A creative space to visually express one's emotions.

features.title: Todo List
features.desc: Task management tool to help channel focus and reduce stress.

portfolio-2.summary: Second version of my portfolio with an emphasis on performance, modularity, and improved project presentation.
portfolio-2.challenge: The previous site was limited in its ability to present detailed case studies and easily evolve, and lacked fluidity and speed at startup.
challengePoints: Optimize the user experience with animations and a more consistent design.
portfolio-2.solution: Complete redesign with reusable components and clear content structuring.
portfolio-2.solutionHighlight: This version facilitates future development and allows for better readability of technical achievements.

features.title: Consistent design system
features.desc: Harmonized components to ensure a stable visual identity.

features.title: Dark/Light mode
features.desc: Adaptive theme for a better user experience.

features.title: Project detail pages
features.desc: Dedicated navigation to showcase challenge, solution, and impact.

portfolio.summary: First version of the portfolio that served as the basis for structuring my positioning and my first public projects.
portfolio.challenge: Quickly launch a professional online showcase while maintaining a clean and modern style.
challengePoints: Deliver within a short timeframe to avoid losing visibility.
Structure the content for smooth reading.
Adopt a modern aesthetic that reflects my professional image.
portfolio.solution: Implementation of an initial version focused on readability with essential sections and a modern front-end stack.
portfolio.solutionHighlight: This foundation allowed us to gather valuable feedback and prepare for the migration to V2.

features.title: Clear landing page
features.desc: Direct presentation of profile and contacts.

features.title: Essential sections
